entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Alberni
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:04 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Alberni 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: W 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm near Lake Cowichan. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm near Lake Cowichan. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
